title: Vegan - Everything You Need to Know
description:
With Thanksgiving days away, Jillian reflects on family and the holidays. Plus, losing weight might not be easy, but it can be simple; and a caller needs help talking to her college coach, who has forced her team to go vegan.


Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s My Fitness App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ

Send us a brief question at jillianpodcast@gmail.com
